concept.title: Multiple Data Collector Instances
concept.shortdesc: You can create multiple instances. Each instance uses the same executables, but can be configured differently and run different pipelines.

conbody.p: You might create multiple instances when you want to run several s on the same host machine.

You can run the instances at the same time, as long as the host machine has enough resources.should I be saying this? Any other limitations? What should I highlight? I ran the same pipeline on both, but I don't need to talk about that!
